message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I know it's worth a lot to me, but I'm open to negotiating a fair price. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your openness to negotiation. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This would still allow us both to get a good deal.  Let's make this happen!
